text: mariyu ayana samudranni - taja mansamu tinataniki mariyu miru dharince abharanalu tiyataniki - miku upayuktamainadiga cesadu. Ayana anugrahanni anvesincataniki (prajalu), andulo odala mida dani nitini cilcukoni povatanni nivu custunnavu. Mariyu bahusa miru krtajnulu avutarani ayana miku (ivanni prasadincadu)
